CHAT.comment: Dear Mom: I made a turkey Today in cub scouts. and I love you because you are very proud of me. I had a good day and you are still proud of me.

context notes say Mot and Chi are seated on the couch together. Mot has arm around Chi and plays with his hair while she talks to him. Chi was focused on the task , taking short pauses to chew on the eraser and think about what he wanted to write. Chi had a little trouble getting started and deciding what to write , MOT suggested Cub Scouts. Chi wrote well once he started. Chi had some difficulty with run on sentences. Mot did a lot of instructing and correcting of Chi. For example , she reminds him that he'd just had homework about writing complete sentences. Also , Chi tries to capitalize today because it is a day and Mot explains it's not a day of the week

u.a: fakes writing so as to be done with the activity
Chi drops pen , then picks it up and starts writing
points to place on paper where Chi could add to sentence
fiddles with pencil in mouth as if bored
MOT jokes that Chi should underline very in the sentence
points to sentence that Chi has just finished
points to each word as rereads sentence
context notes say Mot says each word as Chi writes it
